Name: Florida Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass, TOP with soda.
Review: The Florida sun shines through this fruity, refreshing drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Florida Cocktail contains 66 calories
